title: nillAmal pOghum nilAvE shaTru ninru
sahitya:
nillAmal pOghum nilavE shaTu ninru pO avar varumaLavE 
nenjil iDam koNDa kaNNanaik-kANa nEram kaDandu varuvadoru nIti
niraimatiyAghavum oru tingaLAghum nIti ariyAda unnuDaiya shEdi


anupallavi

  pallAyiram kOTi tArakai shUzhi bhavani vandAi kuraivillaiyE andap-pangayak-
kaNNan manam irangi varum nEram varai pArttup-pO onrum tavaril tavarillaiyE


caraNam    nalla aDiyArgaL puDai shUzha ingu rAja naDai pOTTu varalAm 
nAdak kuzhalUdi rAga mozhi pEsi kAdal uravADi varalAm AnAlum 
onruNDu niccayam idu endan Avi pOghumun vandAlum varalAm
